# ssdtests

<!-- badges: start -->
[![Codecov test coverage](https://codecov.io/gh/poissonconsulting/ssdtests/graph/badge.svg)](https://app.codecov.io/gh/poissonconsulting/ssdtests)
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of ssdtests is to test the ssdtools package.

## Installation

You can install the development version of ssdtests from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("poissonconsulting/ssdtests")
```

```{r, results = "asis", echo = FALSE}
library(ssdtests)
cat(ssdtests::ssdtests_licensing_md())
```
